body_html:
FYI, it's also possible to use the C++ interface directly via JavaCPP and bypass all the slow paths that way too: https://github.com/bytedeco/javacpp-presets/tree/master/tensorflow
https://medium.com/google-cloud/how-to-invoke-a-trained-tensorflow-model-from-java-programs-27ed5f4f502d
